data.name: Letina's Odyssey
data.detailed_description:
Latest Release

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419750/Apostle_Rebellion/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342120/Castaway_of_the_Ardusta_Sea/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989450/Public_Defense_Corp_The_Ambassador_of_Peace/


Upcoming Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724320/Noelle_Does_Her_Best/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198850/How_to_Build_a_Magnificent_Kingdom/


About the Game

Letina, the third princess of her kingdom, has finally received her knighthood.

For her first mission, she must defeat the bandits who are attacking the nearby villages!

Although she's scared, she ventures out to save the citizens in need and show the world what a princess knight can do!

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Fantasy Setting
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Leveling System
  • Skill System

Letina, the third princess of her kingdom, has finally received her knighthood.

For her first mission, she must defeat the bandits who are attacking the nearby villages!

Although she's scared, she ventures out to save the citizens in need and show the world what a princess knight can do!

data.short_description: Letina is on her first mission to defeat bandits attacking the nearby villages! Will she be able to live up to her title as princess and knight?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
